entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
